specials.name: Smite Good
specials.description: The vine selects one enemy it can see - until the start of its next turn, the vine’s Strikes deal an extra 6 evil damage.

specials.name: Captivating Pollen
specials.description: (enchantment, incapacitation, mental, poison) The viper vine releases a 60-foot emanation of invisible pollen that stays in the air for 5 rounds unless dispersed by a moderate or stronger wind. Each creature that enters or starts its turn in the area must attempt a DC 37 Will save or be captivated. The viper vine can't use Captivating Pollen for 1d4 rounds.

If the chosen enemy attacks the vine before the start of his next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack it each turn, the duration continues to extend.
Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Captivating Pollen for 24 hours.
